fragility.properties: Provides cushioning but can be crushed under significant pressure, impact absorbent

fragility.properties: Excellent shock absorption, protects against impact, lightweight

fragility.properties: Rigid and provides a protective shell, but can crack under extreme impact

fragility.properties: Adds structural support within outer packaging, prevents eggs from knocking against each other

fragility.properties: Provides air cushioning, absorbs impacts, flexible

fragility.properties: Provides a strong outer layer of protection, resists crushing

shelf_life.properties: Provides a barrier against moisture loss, prolonging shelf life by reducing dehydration
shelf_life.application: Wrapping individual eggs in some specialized applications to extend freshness

shelf_life.properties: Controls the atmosphere within the package to reduce spoilage and maintain egg quality
shelf_life.application: Specialized packaging for extending the shelf life of processed egg products (e.g., liquid eggs)

shelf_life.properties: Absorbs ethylene gas, which can accelerate spoilage in some foods (though less relevant for eggs themselves, more for nearby products if co-packaged)
shelf_life.application: May be used in conjunction with egg packaging if other products sensitive to ethylene are present

shelf_life.properties: Removes air from the package, inhibiting microbial growth and oxidation
shelf_life.application: Used for processed egg products to extend shelf life and maintain appearance

shelf_life.properties: Protects eggs from UV light exposure, which can degrade egg quality and nutrients
shelf_life.application: Packaging for eggs sold in areas with high UV exposure or stored under bright lights

shelf_life.properties: Incorporates antimicrobial agents to inhibit the growth of bacteria and fungi on the eggshell surface
shelf_life.application: Specialized packaging for extending shelf life and reducing the risk of contamination

shelf_life.properties: Removes oxygen from the package, inhibiting microbial growth and oxidation.
shelf_life.application: Rarely used for whole eggs but potentially useful for extending the shelf life of processed egg products.

shelf_life.properties: Provides a superior barrier against moisture, oxygen, and other gases, extending shelf life.
shelf_life.application: Packaging for processed egg products like dried egg powder.

shelf_life.properties: Absorb moisture to prevent spoilage and maintain dryness.
Provides a moisture barrier on cardboard cartons, improving structural integrity and potentially reducing moisture loss from eggs.
shelf_life.application: Coating for egg cartons to improve their water resistance and durability.
